structure.unit: ARTICLE IV. COMMUNITY ANTENNA TELEVISION SYSTEMS

text.section:
Sec. 8A-145.1. Modifications to federal regulations.
All Licenses shall be subject to the applicable provisions of the Federal Communications Commission Regulations, and any modifications to those regulations shall be considered a part of the License within one (1) year of the adoption of the modification or at the time of License renewal, whichever occurs first.
